about_the_game:
This is the final game in the "Lord of Darkness" trilogy in the genre of old JRPGs with a turn-based combat system. As in the previous installments, the dramatic story is skillfully combined with parody and satirical notes.

These are difficult times. Humanity is in danger of total annihilation, and it remains only to hope for a miraculous salvation. But there are those who are not resigned and are not ready to just wait. The survivors of the explorers are looking for a way to overthrow the Lord of Darkness, and the brave warriors are tasked with defending the entire world.

Will this story have a happy ending? What will the characters have to go through for their goals, and who will play the main role?

You will play as a heroine who, together with you, will uncover the secrets of the dungeons of the Detached Valley. Turn-based battles are waiting for you, reminiscent of the classics of the JRPG genre, and an unusual plot that will definitely surprise you. There are many secrets in the game, and in order to discover them, you will have to explore every corner of the open world.

An exciting adventure awaits you, which will take from 10 to 15 hours. You will be able to explore the world and dungeons, as well as participate in turn-based classic battles, where tactics must be carefully planned. You will find interesting characters, lots of dialogues and lots of secrets and references that will help you immerse yourself deeper into the world of the game.

You will have to find all the answers after going through a difficult path in the game "Lord of Darkness: Celebration".
